title: Fifi Box shares hilarious video of her daughter looking bored next to Sarah Jessica Parker
text:
Sarah Jessica Parker is one of the most recognisable actresses in the world.

But the adorable daughter of radio host Fifi Box seemed to have no idea who she was as she sat patiently beside the Sex And The City star.

Fifi, 42, shared the sweet clip on Instagram on Thursday, showing her daughter Trixie looking unphased despite being sat just centimetres away from acting royalty.

Alongside the video, Fifi posted a laughing face emoji and wrote: 'My darling girl patiently sitting next to @sarahjessicaparker having no idea who she is and keen for mummy to hurry up so we can go home.'

With a following of over 301,000 people, Fifi's friends were quick to comment on the funny video.

Fellow journalist and Sunday Night host Melissa Doyle wrote: 'I love this! Keeping it real.'

While Australian TV personality Grant Denyer commented: 'Oh precious. This looks like me at any party.'

Getting real: Sarah Jessica Parker (left) actress made the candid confession during an interview with Fifi Box (right, with daughter Daisy) for radio's Fifi, Fev & Byron on The Fox

Sarah was in Sydney to launch her new shoe line SJP with the high-end retailer David Jones.

But she left Sex and the City fans reeling during during her interview with Fifi for radio's Fifi, Fev & Byron on The Fox,

Despite her role as shopaholic Carrie Bradshaw in the hit series, Sarah revealed she doesn't really like shopping.

Happy families! Fifi Box has been taking to Instagram to gush about her newborn daughter, Daisy Belle. Pictured alongside her older sister, Trixie

'I'm not a crazy shopper. And haven't been for many years. I think I used to be a little more so. Shopping sometimes can give me anxiety, like, I feel bad,' she admitted.

She said she often questions her purchases, asking herself if it's something she really needs or if she'll even like it in 'five years'.

Her admission left Fifi shocked, with the radio host branding her dislike of shopping 'fascinating'.
description: Sarah Jessica Parker is one of the most recognisable actresses in the world.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
